description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Connecticut Historical Collections, containing a general collection of interesting facts ... relating to the history and antiquities of every town in Connecticut, with geographical descriptions ... Second edition. [With plates.]]" Author: BARBER, John Warner. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.c.4." Page: 152 Place of Publishing: New Haven Date of Publishing: 1856 Publisher: Durrie & Peck Edition: Improved edition. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000194795 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
